Title: Microsoft Copilot (Microsoft 365): Enhanced personalization with memory in Copilot
Description:
Microsoft 365 Copilot will improve memory in Copilot by increasing the relevance and quality of Copilot responses based on previous communications. This AI-powered capability improves the relevance and quality of Copilot responses by learning from previous communications. These memories are private to the user.
GA date: September CY2025
